_comment: Copy to config.json and adjust endpoints for production. You may also inject window.__AIGEN_CONFIG from your server.
_web3_comment: AIGEN is NOT EVM-compatible. It uses Ed25519 signatures (like Solana), not SECP256k1 (like Ethereum). Standard Web3 wallets (MetaMask, etc.) cannot be used. Set enableEvm to false unless you have a custom EVM bridge.
